title: Wrappers
description: Information about wrappers to execute for the order

items.title: Wrapper Entry
items.description: Information about an individual wrapper to execute for the order

address.title: Wrapper address
address.description: The Ethereum address of the wrapper to execute

data.title: Wrapper data
data.description: Any additional data. The format of this data will vary depending on the wrapper you are calling

is_omittable.title: Is Omittable
is_omittable.description: Whether or not this wrapper must be executed exactly as given with the order
